 PREV PACKAGE  NEXT PACKAGE          FRAMES    NO FRAMES DETAIL:   REMOVED |  ADDED |  CHANGED

Package tripleplay.ui

Added Classes and Interfaces
HistoryGroup A scrolling vertical display, optimized for showing potentially very long lists such as a chat log.
HistoryGroup.Labels History group of just labels.
HistoryGroup.RenderableLabel A label that exposes the width hint and preferred size.
Icons.Aggregated Defers to another icon.
Icons.ImageIcon Base class for image icons just handling the image and the callback.
Icons.Offset Nests another icon with an offset.
Icons.Scaled Aggregates and scales another icon.
Style.EffectFactory Used to create text effects.
 

Changed Classes and Interfaces
Background A background is responsible for rendering a border and a fill.
Behavior.Track.State Holds the necessary data for the currently active press.
Button A button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
Clickable Implemented by Elements that can be clicked.
Field.Transformer For native text fields, transforms text during typing.
Field.Validator For native text fields, decides whether to block a keypress based on the proposed content of the field.
Icon An interface for icons.
Icons Contains icon related utility classes and methods, mostly basic icon factories.
Icons.Loader An icon that supports asynchronous images.
Icons.Preloaded A simple icon that uses an {@code Image} to get its dimensions and a simple image layer when rendered.
Interface.Task A time based task that requires an update per frame.
Interface.TaskHandle An object that can be used to remove a previously added task.
Menu.AnimFn Produces an animation for a menu.
MenuHost.Pop An event type for triggering a menu popup.
MenuHost.TriggerPoint Defines how to obtain the point on a trigger where a menu popup originates.
Root The root of a display hierarchy.
Scroller A composite element that manages horizontal and vertical scrolling of a single content element.
Scroller.Clippable Interface for customizing how content is clipped and translated.
Scroller.Listener Listens for changes to the scrolling area or offset.
Scroller.TouchBars Plain rectangle scroll bars that overlay the content area, consume no additional screen space, and fade out after inactivity.
Style Defines style properties for interface elements.
Style.Pos Defines icon position choices.
Style.TextEffect Defines supported text effects.
Style.TextEffectStyle Used to provide concise TextEffect style declarations.
Styles An immutable collection of styles.
Tabs.Highlighter Defines the highlighting of a tab.
Togglable Implemented by Elements that expose a selected state and can be clicked.
